duties_responsibilities.duty: Support and assist the Director of Planning and Procurement in overseeing the demand for the CSI product portfolio and coordinating with manufacturing entities and suppliers.
Ensure accurate PO status/review, product demand forecasting, and product transportation tracking.
Align with the daily activities of customer order fulfillment and facilitate interactions between Sales, Logistics, and other key departments.
Consult with the Planning Specialist to resolve product allocation and reallocation issues, investigate and resolve complex customer issues.
Analyze Demand and align factory resources to Sales forecast and orders.
Develop rolling Sales Forecasts in collaboration with Sales Team and Director of Planning and Procurement.
Collaborate with key departments to prioritize, reconcile, and re-allocate supply in shortage situations, considering customer obligations.
Ensure accurate booking and provisioning of order types in a timely manner.
Work cross-functionally to review non-standard orders and agreements, support Customer PO review, and translate demand/forecast into product production/demand activities.
Assist in operationalizing new product introductions and automation projects.
Review existing policies and processes, recommend changes to upper management, ensure business activities are performed ethically and in compliance with standards.
Support ISO 9001 activities and adhere to environmental, health, and safety rules and policies.
